segments.text: Graham , why are you always on the phone with Jane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because we are partners in our science lab . Why are you so jealous ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The other night when you came home there was lipstick on your right cheek . How do you explain that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My aunt Mary just flew in from Cleveland and she laid one right on my right cheek .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I am . I only love you , Amy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'm sorry . I believe you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you always accuse me like that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because you are the most handsome boy at the university and I love you so much ! I guess I just go crazy sometimes . That's all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Amy . I am the luckiest guy in the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I am loved by the most beautiful girl in the world !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Graham . I love you so much and I really believe in our love .
segments.speaker: S1
